byline.contributor: Aurelien Breeden contributed reporting from Paris, Katie Thomas from New York and Andrew Pollack from San Francisco.

abstract: France's health minister says that six men who were part of Phase 1 clinical drug trial for Portuguese drug manufacturer Bial have been hospitalized with brain damage; company says in statement that it had followed all guidelines and regulations for clinical trials.

headline.print_headline: 6 Hospitalized After a Drug Trial Goes Awry
headline.main: 6 Hospitalized, One of Them Brain-Dead, After Drug Trial in France

snippet: The drug was being tested on healthy volunteers in a licensed private institution specializing in clinical trials, the health minister said.
lead_paragraph: The drug was being tested on healthy volunteers in a licensed private institution specializing in clinical trials, the health minister said.
